import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' type Inputs = { name: string email: string street: string city: string country: string zip: number number: string date: string cvc: number } const CheckoutForm: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const fullName = localStorage.getItem('name_key') as string const email = localStorage.getItem('email_key') as string const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm() return (

Checkout

) } export default CheckoutForm
